_comment: Copy this file to config/config.json and replace all placeholder values. Remove keys starting with '_' before use.
_git_provider_note: Either 'github' or 'bitbucket'. Auto-detected from repo_url if omitted.
_git_username_note: Your Git username (GitHub login or Bitbucket username).
_git_password_note: GitHub PAT (Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens) OR Bitbucket App Password. Never your real account password.
_git_branch_note: Default branch to clone and create feature branches from.
_github_owner_note: OPTIONAL (GitHub only). GitHub user or organisation name. Used by multi-repo scan to list and process all repos under this owner.
_project_keys_note: OPTIONAL (Bitbucket only). List of Bitbucket project keys. The multi-repo scan will iterate every repository under each project key.
_jira_url_note: OPTIONAL. Leave blank to enter requirements manually in the UI. e.g. https://your-company.atlassian.net
_jira_email_note: OPTIONAL. Email tied to your Jira account (used with the API token).
_jira_ticket_note: OPTIONAL. Default Jira ticket to process. Can be overridden via --ticket flag.
_workspace_dir_note_windows: Windows example: C:/Users/john/workspaces  (use forward slashes or double backslashes)
_usage: 2. Edit config/config.json â€” fill in real values, remove all _ keys.
